entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 03:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -22.0°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:47 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
